title: Access is authorized, authenticated, and appropriate
text: User access must be authorized, authenticated, and periodically reviewed. MFA enforced for privileged roles. Evidence: access reviews quarterly.

title: Quarterly access review + MFA
text: Organizations review access rights at least quarterly. MFA enforced on privileged accounts; stale access removed within SLA.

title: Identification and Authentication (Organizational Users)
text: The system enforces multifactor authentication for network access to privileged accounts and remote access to non-privileged accounts.

title: Secure log-on procedures
text: Strong authentication, unique IDs, and secure log-on procedures are required for systems handling sensitive data.

title: Corporate MFA Policy
text: All admin roles require MFA. All customer-facing apps must support FIDO2/WebAuthn. Replay resistance required. Evidence stored in S3 audit bucket.
